track.strDescriptionEN:
"Replay" is a song performed by British Virgin Islands recording artist Iyaz. It is the first single released from his debut album Replay, which was released on 8 June 2010.

The single "Replay" was produced by J. R. Rotem who credits himself at the beginning of the song via his signature "J.R." sample. "Replay" debuted on the Billboard Hot 100 at #96 and has peaked at #2. Meanwhile, the song debuted at #1 in the United Kingdom on 10 January 2010 (for the week ending 16 January 2010) and stayed there for 2 weeks until it was knocked off the summit by "Fireflies" by Owl City. The combined figure of the official music video and prequel video on YouTube is about 103 million views.
